product_name: Avalon Travel Publishing The Dog Lover's Companion to Washington D.C. - 3rd Edition
long_description: No bones about it: the updated edtion of The Dog Lover's Companion to Washington D.C. reveals all the best places to take your dog within the Beltway and surrounding areas.
